name: org.apache.cordova.hellocordova
description: A sample Apache Cordova application that responds to the deviceready event.

scripts.build: npm run gen && cordova build android
scripts.run: adb -s emulator-5556 install -r platforms/android/app/build/outputs/apk/debug/app-debug.apk && adb -s emulator-5556 shell am start -n org.apache.cordova.hellocordova/.MainActivity
scripts.build:run: npm run build && npm run run
scripts.dev:android: cordova clean && cordova prepare android && cordova build android && cordova run android --emulator
scripts.install:testpic: adb wait-for-device && adb install -r platforms/android/app/build/outputs/apk/debug/app-debug.apk && adb shell monkey -p org.apache.cordova.hellocordova -c android.intent.category.LAUNCHER 1

author: Apache Cordova Team
